I couldn't locate the specific post at the provided link. However, Y Combinator has been actively investing in AI-driven startups across various sectors. For instance, Plume Energy (YC S24) developed an AI copilot for home energy renovation professionals, capable of gathering house data and evaluating energy grades from just an address. citeturn0search0

Additionally, Y Combinator's President, Garry Tan, suggested a heuristic for finding AI startup ideas: "Look at things that rich people pay humans to do, and give them to everyone using AI." citeturn0search4

These examples illustrate Y Combinator's focus on leveraging AI to democratize services and enhance efficiency across industries.
